function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of customer needs identification","Impact":"Ineffective response to customer needs, leading to dissatisfaction and reduced trust","Mitigation":"Training and development for SMEs to improve customer needs identification","Technologies":"Customer relationship management (CRM) systems","People":"SMEs, customers","Owner":"SME management"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of latent customer needs","Impact":"Missed opportunities to provide value to customers, leading to reduced competitiveness","Mitigation":"Market research and analysis to uncover latent customer needs","Technologies":"Big data analytics tools","People":"SMEs, customers","Owner":"SME management"}]}
